mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(idx, title, contents, author_id, author_name, uptime, hits) VALUES(nextval('board_idx_seq'), #{title}, #{contents}, #{author_id}, #{author_name}, now() , 0)
mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, author_name, to_char(uptime, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as uptime, hits FROM board
SELECT idx, title, contents, author_id, author_name, to_char(uptime, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as uptime, hits FROM board WHERE 1=1 AND idx = #{idx}
